merchantman.name: Merchantman

blacksmith.name: Blacksmith
blacksmith.description: Has heightened manipulation over reforges, and can give swords to players without dropping them.

sniper.description: Has a gun and can throw grenades and flashbangs

banneret.name: Banneret
banneret.description: Passively and actively buff guards, including themselves.

accountant.name: Accountant
accountant.description: Gets passive buffs to funding and active buffs to farming.
